issue.title: [R] Linux binary packaging followup
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7575](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7575). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After ARROW-6793 merged, I set up some nightly binary building CI and need to iterate on the install script and documentation to reflect what is available there.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7575?focusedCommentId=17015482) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6194
